Reviewing and Moving Labels

To see the labels currently attached to specific items and folders, you can display them on the Label pane. In the case of revision labels, you can also move them to another revision of the folder or item.

To review all labels attached to item revisions:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click a component tab.

  3. Select an item from the upper pane.

  4. Select the Label tab. This action displays the Label pane, which shows all revisions for the item.

  5. Double-click a revision to display its labels.

To move a revision label from one item revision to another:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click a component tab.

  3. Select an item from the upper pane.

  4. Select the Label tab. This action displays the Label pane, which shows all revisions for the item.

  5. Double-click a revision to display its labels.

  6. Select a revision label, and drag it from one item revision to another.

    7. Note: Remember that a label can be attached to only one revision.

To review all labels attached to a folder's revisions:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select Labels from the Folder or context menu. The Labels dialog opens, showing all labels currently attached to this folder on a revision-by-revision basis.

To move a revision label from one folder revision to another:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select Labels from the Folder menu. The Labels dialog opens, showing all labels currently attached to the folder on a revision-by revision basis.

  3. Drag a revision label from one folder revision to another.

    4. Note: Remember that a label can be attached to only one revision.
